Module PakFile
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/PakFile/Public/IPlatformFilePak.h
Include #include "IPlatformFilePak.h"

Syntax

class FPakPlatformFile : public IPlatformFile

Remarks

Platform file wrapper to be able to use pak files.
